comment._content: Commander of the Pacific division of the U.S. fleet in 1914, see The Day book., April 29, 1914, NOON EDITION, Page 15

comment._content: Thanks so much for your research B-59. We'll add the information about his command of the U.S. Fleet in the Pacific the next time we update the record.
